about_the_game:
It's a cold morning in the dungeons of Castle Moonshine and cyberized hunk Ryukaze and his many friends and foes are moping around in their cells, not remembering who they are or what they are doing there. Their wretched lives are about to change however when a mysterious psychopath approaches them with a diabolical plan. Could this all be the work of the School Held Back Program? Yes, it is. The gang soon find themselves hopelessly lost in the darkest corners of the dungeon, disillusioned but determined to survive. Only one question remains...

What is the point of Phucker in the Rome?

GENRE
Roller Coaster Psychological Edge of Your Seat Visual Novel Thriller

GAME INFO
Use the mouse to navigate, make important choices and self-investigate. Be enthralled by the gripping story line with a twist ending that will have you reeling for days.

PROS
 Is better than Woods and Gulag.
 Babes and hunks beyond your wildest imagination.
 Will elicit "gamer feels".

CONS
 Is in good taste.
 Makes sense.
 Will increase your social credit score.

content_descriptors.notes: Drug and alcohol use, violence, sexual themes, nudity, self harm.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 resolution or better

short_description: It's a cold morning in the dungeons of Castle Moonshine and cyberized hunk Ryukaze and his many friends and foes are moping around in their cells, dazed and confused... Their wretched lives are about to change however when a mysterious psychopath approaches them with a diabolical plan.
